content: That's great to know about the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel. I'll definitely give it a try. Speaking of skin tone, I've been thinking about my own cultural heritage and how it affects my skin. Since I'm half Indian and half Irish, I've got a mix of dark and fair skin. Do you think there are any skincare products that cater specifically to Indian or Irish skin tones, or are there any ingredients that are particularly beneficial for these skin types?
